data.title: Postdoctoral Researcher - Preclinical Pain Research, 1 FTE, School of Medicine, 010369, University of Galway
data.meta_description: Applications are invited from suitably qualified candidates for a full-time, fixed-term position as a Postdoctoral Researcher in preclinical pain research within the Discipline of Pharmacology and Therapeutics, School of Medicine at the University of Galway, Ireland.
data.text:
Applications are invited from suitably qualified candidates for a full-time, fixed-term position as a Postdoctoral Researcher in preclinical pain research within the Discipline of Pharmacology and Therapeutics, School of Medicine at the University of Galway, Ireland.

The post is funded by a European Research Council (ERC) grant facilitating collaborative work between Prof. David P. Finn, Prof. Martin O’Halloran, and Relevium Medical. Successful candidates will join a vibrant group of researchers in University of Galway’s Neuroscience Centre and Centre for Pain Research. This position is available from the 8th July 2024 to contract end date of 7th June 2025.

Salary: Postdoctoral Researcher salary scale €43,907 - €56,202 per annum, (subject to the project’s funding limitations), and pro rata for shorter and/or part-time contracts.

Closing date for receipt of applications is 17:00 (Irish Time) on 29th May 2024. It will not be possible to consider applications received after the closing date.
